name: SoloS (itch) (UnderdogsUnlimited)
description:
Your friend is stuck in an alternate dimension and you need to help him get out. He can't interact with anything in the physical world, so you need to do it for him. You can't enter rooms that are too dark, so he'll turn on the lights for you.

WASD to move around, SPACE to interact, and Q to swap worlds.
